thread.title: Re: ‘Worst tweet of the year’? Perpetually spinning Chris Cuomo sends heads to desks (again)
thread.title_full: Re: ‘Worst tweet of the year’? Perpetually spinning Chris Cuomo sends heads to desks (again)

author: AverageJoe1987
title: Re: ‘Worst tweet of the year’? Perpetually spinning Chris Cuomo sends heads to desks (again)
text:
— Dave Herculon (@DaveEverlasting) February 23, 2017 I have two young daughters. I have the same instinct to protect. Seeing the basis for equality doesn't make you pro predator https://t.co/9vgu08ydER 
— Christopher C. Cuomo (@ChrisCuomo) February 23, 2017 Evidently When A Dude Whips Out His ManJunk On A 12 Y/O Girl…It May Be Her Fault.. @ChrisCuomo #TRUMP #CPAC2017 #CNNLeaks #EndItMovement pic.twitter.com/cQ7bTgiTQV 
— John Dee✘-Deplorable (@GaltsGultch) February 23, 2017 I meant no such thing and you know it. You are trying to justify a weak argument. Scotus will decide next month https://t.co/Hc2FfmyALg 
— Christopher C. Cuomo (@ChrisCuomo) February 23, 2017 @ChrisCuomo Not wanting your 12 yr old to see a penis while using the restroom is being an intolerant overprotective parent? WTF? Wow.
